Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from INFV A polymerase (PB1))
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19841738]Influenza A(FluA):inhibition of PA-binding activity and virus replication(IC50=661.77 ±22.08 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Influenza virus replication and transcription is performed in the nucleus by the heterotrimeric viral polymerase complex consisting of the PB1, PB2, and PA subunits.The peptide could bind with PA subunit thus inhibit the virus replication.

Literature.Title: Identification of a PA-binding peptide with inhibitory activity against influenza A and B virus replication.
Literature.Author: Wunderlich K, Mayer D, Ranadheera C, Holler AS, Mänz B, Martin A, Chase G, Tegge W, Frank R, Kessler U, Schwemmle M.
